thread.title: QUIZ: How much are you panicking about Results Day?
thread.title_full: QUIZ: How much are you panicking about Results Day? - Telegraph

author: James Connington
title: QUIZ: How much are you panicking about Results Day?
text: For those waiting on A-level results, the arduous process is nearly at an end. It’s now just one week to go until Results Day , and next Thursday hundreds of thousands of students across the country will find out if they have made the required grades to get into university. The long interval between finishing exams and receiving results can be a stressful experience, and students all have their own ways of coping. From the people who seem to take it all in their stride, to those who can’t help being unreasonably pessimistic, everyone manages the experience differently. So are you the kind of person who can push it to the back of their mind? Or have you been living and breathing results since you finished exams? Take our quiz below to find out how well you’re managing the wait for Results Day (and potentially to see a calming picture of some puppies, if you meet the requirements).
